row.process: ! This Include is used in Process tab of Workflows, so that &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# is not available. ! Path to report will be normalized where it is used. ! GET RUNID OF WORKFLOW :SET &RUNID# = SYS_ACT_RESTART_ME_NR() :SET &RUNID# = FORMAT("&RUNID#", "") :SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BACKUP', &AGENT#) :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#/&$CLIENT#-&LOGIN#/&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#/&RUNID#" :SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT# = "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#/report.txt" :IF &$RUNMODE# EQ "NORMAL" : PUB &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#, , "TASK" : PUB &UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#, , "TASK" :ENDIF
